name: Computer Science & Engineering
description: Focuses on software development, algorithms and modern computing.
fullDescription: The CSE department trains students in software engineering, algorithms, system design and modern computing paradigms. We emphasize practical labs, project-based learning and industry-aligned curriculum.

name: Information Technology
description: Covers networking, web development and information systems.
fullDescription: The IT department focuses on network administration, web systems, cybersecurity basics and enterprise IT solutions. Students get hands-on networking and web application experience.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: Deals with electronics, signals and communication systems.
fullDescription: ECE covers analog/digital electronics, signal processing, embedded systems and wireless communication. The department maintains modern electronics labs and project work options.

name: Mechanical Engineering
fullDescription: Mechanical Engineering focuses on mechanics, thermodynamics, CAD/CAM and manufacturing processes. Students work on workshops and lab-based projects.

name: Civil Engineering
fullDescription: Civil Engineering covers structural analysis, geotechnical engineering, construction management and surveying. The department offers fieldwork and lab sessions.

name: Master of Business Administration
fullDescription: MBA provides training in finance, marketing, HR, operations and entrepreneurship. The program offers case studies, internships and industry interactions.
